otupy

  • 5 CTXD Data Types
  • 5.1 Name

5.1 Name

The Name type is used to indicate the name of any object. When the Command Argument is “name_only”, an array of Name is returned to the Producer.

Type: Name (Choice)

ID

Name

Type

#

Description

1

uri

URI

1

Uniform Resource Identifier of the service.

2

reverse_dns

Hostname

1

Reverse domain name notation.

3

uuid

UUID

1

Universally unique identifier of the service.

4

local

str

1

Name without guarantee of uniqueness.
